summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 37th Avenue South from a point 342 feet south of Dawson Street to Hudson Street; by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances; and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8266 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
